com.poesys.accounting.db.account

Interface IAccountGroup

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto>, com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto, com.poesys.db.dto.IObserver, com.poesys.db.dto.ISubject, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAccountGroup, AbstractAccountGroupProxy, AccountGroup, AccountGroupProxy

    public interface IAccountGroup
extends com.poesys.db.dto.IDbDto

    A data-access layer data-transfer-object interface for the AccountGroup. The data-transfer-object class and proxy class implement this interface, as does the business-layer data-transfer-object class.

    A named group of accounts, grouping the accounts for presentation and aggregation in financial statements

    Stereotypes:

    • NaturalKey
    • Persistent

    Class is read/write: true

    Author:
    Poesys/DB Cartridge
